AD_AfterVossFight.synopsis: Happens only when Laezel chooses to fight Voss, so she's always on the Vlaakith path.
AD_AfterVossFight.how_to_trigger: Laezel comments after killing Voss at the camp confrontation.

PAD_PickupGithRadar.synopsis: Party comments on how weird it is. VB tries to pass in Laezel first, but if unavailable, someone else will say it.
PAD_PickupGithRadar.how_to_trigger: Pickup the Gith Radar from Voss's dead body if you chose not to help him.

PAD_ReadSharessCaressNote.synopsis: Players note that Voss was going to meet someone important in Sharess Caress, might be worth checking out.Plays on the character who reads the note.
PAD_ReadSharessCaressNote.how_to_trigger: Read the note you get from Voss's corpse in the camp confrontation.

AD_AfterVossFight_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_AfterVossFight_0.text: The traitor Voss is dead. Let his heresy die with him.

PAD_PickupGithRadar_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PickupGithRadar_0.text: What an odd gadget. What's it for, I wonder?

PAD_ReadSharessCaressNote_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadSharessCaressNote_0.text: Voss' next destination was Baldur's Gate. We should check out Sharess' Caress when we get there.
